name: Too Hot! Too Cold!
description:
Too Hot! Too Cold! is a puzzle game made for the Level Up Circle: Beginner Jam #1.

Use Magma and Water to control the temperature of stones. Drag and make the path for these fluids to flow and reach their correct spot.

This is my first game jam and first publicly shared project. I really enjoyed doing this project and I am thinking to work on this project after the game jam.

Note : This game is little heavy to run in browser due to fluids simulation and poor optimization (less time :(). I assure you I will release a browser version too later on.

Please leave a comment with any suggestion or opinion about the game. Thanks for playing.
